name: Ashes of War
description:
Thrown into a century long war between the Union and the Kingdoms, a lone starship Captain decides to rebel against his fate. Join him in his galactic journey and discover the various stories that can still bloom in the Ashes of War.

"Ashes of War" offers you the classic VN experience with cute and fun characters, beautiful CGs, rich storytelling, and romance options between the colorful cast, this time with a Sci-Fi militaristic background.



Faced with numerous challenges, some less mundane than others, make sure your ship and allies do not meet a grim fate while you build relationships with the four heroines and delve into the story of individuals trying to enjoy their newly found freedom.

Follow the adventures of Captain Aron Lancer turned deserter as he learns to flirt his way through the galaxy in this brand new Sci-Fi Visual Novel!

Features


- Visual novel with dynamic 3D CGs for action scenes.
- 2D and 3D artwork made with passion.
- Mostly kinetic.(for now)
